item.title: Sweat
item.description: [[songs/t/the_technicians/evolver_ost/beat_the_machine.md#well-its-reality-vyl-wnanory|I’m sweating, and breathing,]] [[songs/t/the_technicians/evolver_ost/beat_the_machine.md#well-its-reality-vyl-wnanory|And staring, and thinking,]] [[songs/t/the_technicians/evolver_ost/beat_the_machine.md#well-its-reality-vyl-wnanory|Sinking deeper.]] [[songs/t/the_technicians/evolver_ost/beat_the_machine.md#well-its-reality-vyl-wnanory|And it’s almost like I’m swimming.]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/keep_on.md#again-and-again-and-again-i-get-tested-vyl-wnanory|The sun is burning hot again]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/keep_on.
